# .gitignore reference

* For including in personal projects or for global exclusion

```
### OS generated files ###
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db
Desktop.ini

### STS ###
.apt_generated
.classpath
.factorypath
.project
.settings
.springBeans
.sts4-cache

### IntelliJ IDEA ###
.idea
*.iws
*.iml
*.ipr

### NetBeans ###
/nbproject/private/
/nbbuild/
/dist/
/nbdist/
/.nb-gradle/
/build/

### VS Code ###
.vscode/

### spring-boot ###
target/
**/logs
**/work
tmp

### Java ###
/target/

### Maven wrapper ###
!.mvn/wrapper/maven-wrapper.jar

### Logs ###
*.log
```
